nodes.text: Flappy was the name of one of Yarvok's award-winning pet Xuvva. Krupo, a beast wrangler, lost Flappy along with several of Yarvok's other pets after a ship carrying the pets crashed on the planet Dantooine, to Yarvok's anger. Yarvok threatened to kill Krupo if his missing pets, including Flappy, were not found immediately.

Flappy was mentioned in the Codex entry for Invasive Species on Dantooine in the 2019 expansion Onslaught to the 2011 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic by the company BioWare.
